```{r load_packages, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```



```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("circle", fill = "#e4e4e4", height = "15px"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-circle", fill = "#428bca", height = "15px"))


wk_post <- tibble(
  
"eCampus" = c(unchecked, 
              unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked,
              checked),

"Slack" = c(checked,
            checked,
            unchecked,
            unchecked,
            checked,
            unchecked,
            unchecked),

Description = c("Respond to the posts on `#davidson` and `#mathison`",
                "Respond to the posts on `#evaluation-definitions`",
                "Read three chapters in your book",
                "Go through a slideshow",
                "Post on evaluation `#criteria`",
                "Finalize and submit your evaluation teams",
                "Take a look at the criteria needed for an Evaluation Prospectus due in ***one week!***"),

Location = c("[Link](/readings/03-readings/#respond-to-posts)",
             "[Link](/lesson/03-lesson/#respond-to-posts)",
             "[Link](/readings/03-readings/#read-the-book)",
             "[Link](/lesson/03-lesson/#learning-about-criteria)",
             "[Link](/readings/03-readings/#read-the-book)",
             "[Link](/lesson/03-lesson/#creating-evaluation-teams)",
             "[Link](/deliverables/01-evaluation-prospectus/)")

)
```
